reviews.text: Despite new ownership the pizza was still excellent.  Now converted to a Vietnamese/ pizza place.

This was by far the worst pizza i ever had in my entire life. The sauce tasted like it was watered down, the dough was thick and very spongy like. I Will never return to this pizzeria. I Bought a large pie, took about 2 bites, the rest went into the garbage. Huge disappointment. .
Best Vietnamese Pho on the East Coast.  Not what you would expect from a pizzeria!
My Nonni took us there and they had the best pizza and spumoni

This was my neighborhood growing up and its a shame to see another Bronx institution vanish and to be replaced by a pizza/vietnamese restaurant?  Ridiculous.  My grandfather is probably spinning in his grave
Love their pizza
The best food anywhere
For Sicilian pizza, Sorrento's is the place to go. They never disappoint.

Been going for several yrs. Always a please and enjoyable dinner...
We  love the Greek potatoes..platers are always plentiful
Service is excellent,you will have a short wait when it gets busy.

I came to this place to get a slice or a sandwich, then I saw an Asian young man eating a big bowl of Pho Xe Lua and I changed my mind, I ordered it and it was delicious.

Vine a este lugar para conseguir una rebanada o un s√°ndwich, luego vi a un joven asi√°tico comiendo un gran taz√≥n de Pho Xe Lua y cambi√© de opini√≥n, lo consegu√≠ y estaba delicioso.
I come to the bronx every week spend time with my mother and sorrento's baked ziti. Our favorite!!! new owners not the same recipes üòï sorry good luck blessings‚Ä¶
Definitely enjoy the food will come back once and a while.
Love the vietnamese food here!

It is very chill. I Ate here with wifey, and the pizza sauce is fantastic. Clean area with clean bathroom and just in case they have hand sanitizer in each table. Definitely will come back here again.

Called for a pizza pie. Man over the phone told me he couldn‚Äôt come upstairs to my door because he doesn‚Äôt understand how the intercom system works. The man also said and I quote. ‚Äú I have a college degree and I still can‚Äôt understand that thing‚Äù  All other deliveries make their way to my door except for these guys. Management should look into this. Been ordering from you guys for then last 15 years and now I can‚Äôt get a pizza pie from one of my favorite pizza joint.
Awesome Italian food! ü§åüëçüëå‚úåÔ∏èüáÆüáπüáÆüáπ

Great place! Great food! I was skeptical at first when I heard there was a change of ownership. However, I have already been there a few times & I can safely say that under the new ownership the pizza & all other food has actually gotten better!!!!
Best Sicilian Slice
Friendlly as can be.   Fresh & tasty pizza.

Yes, the comments are true, ever since new owners took over the pizza doesn't taste the same, that's because it tastes SO MUCH BETTER NOW. Finally, the slices have flavor, everyone in my family loves it.
New owner, kept the cooks so the food is the same. Need to do something about the air conditioning in the summer...
SOLD TO AN ASIAN GUY.  Pizza is just not the same.  This place was a staple in the neighborhood all my life.   Very disappointed.  Best of luck to the new owner.

Update - 7/2023 New owners at Sorrentos. Pizza is NOT the same. So sad about this.

I love Sorrento's. They are very attentive and the food is genuine. The have the best pizza and the pasta is great as well.
Great pizza spot
Excellent service! Called early in the morning and they really came thru! Thanx guys. Tasty n delicious
A neighborhood staple, with a very friendly staff. Delicious food served hot and ready to go.
Best Sicilian pizza in the Bronx! Always very friendly...
Awesome pizza! Best I‚Äôve had.
Never disappoints. Maybe just the wings.
Great pizza
Still think they have the best Sicilian slices in NYC I come here from Brooklyn
been getting sicilian here for over 30 years and never disappoints!!!!!
Great service and great food. Very friendly people in a very friendly neighborhood.
I love the Sicilian  sliceüçïüçï
We always get lasagna here when we're in the area. Great pizza too!
Best Sicilian around
Customer service is great and the pizza is quality only thing is that recently the sauce has been a bit bland lately. Other than that I love this pizzeria.
Good  Sicilian slices.
Great Sicilian's
Great local pizza shop. Very clean. Good prices.
3.75 for chz slice!!! more expensive than in manhatan!!  and it doesn‚Äôt taste good!!

Small for $3.25 and not enough crust covered for the price.
Undercooked cheese.
Only seasoning discernible is salt
An okay slice,  but I won't be back..
I'll rate it 82
Best Sicilian pizza in the Bronx
Amazing slices, consistent quality and taste. Always a go-to!
Greatest pizza ever! Everything is super delicious.We drive from New Jersey for this :)
Loved
Best Sicilian pizza in the Bronx
Some of the best pizza you'll ever have. Everything is good here.

Love the Sicilian
Perfection!
Best Sicilian pizza anywhere. Fact.

Service and friendliness : 5 stars, food: 4 stars, overall experience: 5 stars
Another good pizza place in the Morris Park area of the Bronx.  The cheese pizza slice is huge and steaming hot. I love Sorrento‚Äôs regular thin crust pizza that stays crunchy until the last bite.
I tried a slice of the Sicilian per other reviews; I did not enjoy it as much as the traditional plain pizza. It must be my taste buds, and I did not let it affect my experience at this place.
I concur with other reviews that the people at this place are very friendly. Service was quick, and help were plentiful.
Will I return to this place? I will.

Family run pizzeria that's been there since the sun ignited!  Phenomenal New York style pizza and great Sicilian pies as well.  Friendly staff.  Even the lady who takes your phone orders is a sweetheart.  I can't stand Dominos or Pizza Hut.  Nothing like fresh made pizza. üçïüçïüçï Sorry about the two missing slices.  I couldn't wait!‚Ä¶

Best slices of pizza in the Bronx! The sauce is on point, fresh mozzarella, perfect, tasty crust. The sicilians are just as good. Prices are normal. I know the decor may need a upgrade, but it doesn't matter. The place is clean and service‚Ä¶
Simple, sweet and delicious, very good! After half a year did not patronize, the taste is still a great!

I didn't grow up in this neighborhood, so I have no  pizzeria loyalty here. I've tried almost all of the pizzerias on Morris Park Ave and Wiliamsbridge Rd over the last 2 years and Sorrento's is my favorite. Their grandma pie is amazing and‚Ä¶

I have no idea why it's taken me so long to rate this place. I've been going to Sorrento's for about 3 years now. The 1st thing I had from here was the Sicilian slice and it was so good I haven't been able to try anything else. The pizza‚Ä¶

Had a slice there. The pizza shop itself was nice and quiet. The pizza was delicious. It's also cheaper than neighboring pizza shops (by about 50c). The slice had a good amount of sauce, and was sweeter than the other pizza shops in the area (which I like.) Would eat there again.
Great prices for tasty food, recommend this spot, They also have nice wings.

I usually look for the highest rated places. So I decided to come to this one of all around. I was really amazed at the friendly service they had. You know, NYC is not know for the best hospitality. The price was very affordable 1 large pie‚Ä¶

The BEST PIZZA EVER!!! Sorrento's has been making the BEST Sicilian (thick square pizza) for ever. It is great today, just like it was 20 years ago. This is a local pizza place that never disappoints. Regular, round pies are also delicious, but try their amazing thick sicilian slice for a filling treat.

Just met the owner in Restaurant Depot, what a nice guy.  He let me ditch IN front of him because I only had 3 items.  Can't wait to stop in and have a Sicilian slice!  sounds like it is the pizza of choice....

By far best pizza in the area!! I lived around the block and would come here at least 3x week! Everyone I brought there loved it!! Now that I moved to PA, I wish I could get it delivered here!!!üòÅ Large slices, and just so good! Nothing like Sorrentos, NY pizza‚Ä¶

A tremendous disappointment.  I read a good rating and the place is very near to home so I decided to try it.   I went in with a friend.  I ordered 2 regular slices.  She ordered a white, and a  pepperoni slice.  My first bit I felt the‚Ä¶

Ordered a sicilian pie with meatballs and sausage and extra cheese. The delivery person was not friendly and the pie was dry and cheese globbed on .Could not taste sauce on dry crust. Had no taste like yesterdays leftovers re heated. Would not recommend to anyone.

I always enjoy going here when I am in the Bronx. My family will order it and go pick it up but today my grandson and I went to pick it up. He could not wait to get home and grab a slice of pizza and eat the pizza.. Woohoo I always look forward to enjoying a slice of pizza from Sorrento.

Ah, why not. I will give this place 5 stars. They always have given what I paid for with a reasonable price. The service is good and they never messed up on my order once. The hours of operation works for me. When you order something they‚Ä¶

Wow! Amazing pizza from a solid New York pizza joint. Atmosphere is very authentic, I tried the Sicilian and everything about it was perfect.  Not too salty for those of you who are concerned about your sodium intake.

I've not ate from Sorrento's in a long time. It was always in the city. First time order here from the Bronx. Delivery was received earlier than expected through Grubhub. Driver was very kind, and walked away the way to the front door.  Food was still hot, and order as expected. Will definitely order again . Thank you.

Most delicious pizzas in the Bronx, hell one of the best in most of the US of  A. Their Sicilian is outstanding,  with a home made sauce. And all the brothers are some of the friendliest and caring  guys around.
Have always loved this place. Lorenzo Z Tartaglia.

Crusty burnt pizza. I been here before, last summer, and was not impressed. I got pasta, and they gave me like a small plate of spaghetti then like I believe a small piece of chicken parmesan. I dont really remember but I was upset because‚Ä¶

Visiting The Bronx, NY  with some girlfriends and we wanted New York Pizza. Alessandro was behind the counter and greeted us with a warm welcome, he went out of his way to make sure our order was perfect! The pizza was delicious , but‚Ä¶

I was walking by and I saw people coming in and out of the restaurant. Car were even dobble parked to pick up there order. So I decided to enter and buy a slice to see. WOW no wonder. The Pizza was amazing. Friendly staff. My new pizza place for now on.

Sorrento pizzeria it's an ok pizza place... My wife raves about their Sicilian pizza but I think that's the whole reason why I'm not crazy about it, I'm not a Sicilian pizza guy.. I like the fact that they have been there for years and are‚Ä¶
Don‚Äôt get shrimp if you order penne a ala vodka for lunch. Paid $6.25 extra for 4 tiny peices of fried breaded shimp. Who puts fried breaded shrimp on top of penne ala vodka? Never saw it before

Disgusting. Never again will I order from this place. I ordered a Margarita slice with pepperoni from this place...burned around the edges and there was something thick and gooey on the sauce  which was hardened along with the mozzarella. Stay clear of this place

OMG this place is delicious. I moved here a week ago and have been here twice. Great slices and calzones plus the service is friendly, helpful, and the workers and tasting food is CONSISTENT. Will always bring family and friends here who visit.

I order out often. The last 2x i ordered a pie. They lack. Cheese. Sauce and have been frugal with the extras. Im extremely disappointed. I will never order from sorrentos again. Lots of other great spots here in morris park. Btw. I called to voice my disappointment and just got an im sorry..   life goes on.
Favorite place for many years.never had the heros or dinners because I have always loved their pizza.it is now my 2nd fave pizza place used to be first. Still one of best in area.
My brother and I are from Chicago. Step off the plane and head to Sorrento for a slice whenever we come into NY for a family visit. Pizza is great and the guys are aces.

Just ordered tonight a chicken. Cutlet parm calzone and the girl put regular chicken cutlets with ricotta and sauce on side, a meatball calzone and she put sausage in it instead. It was gross and can say they lost a costumer tonight.
Best pizza I have ever ate. They use the best cheese you can buy as well. I can never get enough and they have friendly staff.

Had to try me a NYC pizza slice before I left and I am glad we stopped here , they were friendly folks and the pizza omg....Nice crispy crust sooooo chessy nice tangy sauce and not that much grease! Will def revisit once I am in NYC

TERRIBLE customer service. We accidentally called this restaurant thinking it was a restaurant close to us and made an order. We called back 15 minutes later to apologize and notify Sorrento's that the order was made in error. The person on‚Ä¶
